message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering the value it holds. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value you'll receive from the product. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
